column4: I'm back, I now have an network cart that Ubuntu sees but how do I configure it to network with an Computer? DHCP is that an router gives the computer his/her ip adresses and stuff. But if I want to connect my Ubuntu pc with my router thru an other computer do I then have to forward ports or something? Note that the computer I want to make contact woth the router thru is an winxp xomputer.
I have an usb wlan thingy and that has only support for windows
USB wireless networking doesn't work with Linux at this time, I believe.
